mapper.select: SELECT pbl.libraryName pLibraryName,bl.libraryName,bs.id samleId,bs.*,bm.* FROM barn_sample bs LEFT JOIN barn_register br ON bs.pId = br.id LEFT JOIN barn_library bl ON br.libraryId = bl.id LEFT JOIN barn_library pbl ON bl.pLibraryId = pbl.id LEFT JOIN barn_manuscript bm ON bm.sampleId = bs.id where bl.id = #{libraryId} and bs.position = #{position} and bs.gainTime = #{gainTime}
